p: The IHF-QoL was used to assess QoL in patients. It has 15 questions and studies 5 domains of QoL including the symptoms and their severity, physical limitations, social interference, psychological condition and self-efficacy, and knowledge. Each field has 5, 1, 4, 3 and 2 questions, respectively. Question number 16 is a conclusive item in which the patients respond to their overall quality of life as unfavorable, moderately favorable, and favorable. The questionnaire was developed and validated by Naderi et al. in 2013 in Iran [ 11].
